Message.Title: the olympics stink
Message.Msg: my how times change. Last great olympics in my memory was 1976. Then they focused on amateur athletics. It was interesting and great. Since then TV has decided to cater to female viewers. Boxing is no longer shown on network TV. Relegated to cable. Weightlifting...superheavyweights, not to be seen. Instead we get all that up close and personal stuff that only women care about. They eat it up. Now we get beach volleyball on primetime network TV. Don't know how that ever became an olympic sport. We get tennis. Tennis is a fine sport but it's just another tournament for the pros. is it a big deal seeing Serena William win? Basketball? NBA that's all. I am watching very little olympics. However, track and field is starting and I'll watch that. It's the only interesting thing they show on primetime.

perfect example of what I"M saying! a dem in wh and you don"t like the games> .................................................................. Nonsense. Last great games in '76. Do you recall Sugar Ray Leonard? Carter was prez then, wsn't he? No guess not...he was elected in November of that year. We boycotted the '80 games in Moscow. Things began to change in '84...LA olympics with "We Are the World" and all that lefty drivel. Downhill ever since thru Reagan, Bush, Clinton etc.
Hey, moron, he is useless for the remainder. He is too busy playing golf and campaigning! Obama is a Loser, Liar, and a Murderer!
The POS may not have been President for FOUR years but it dammmm well feels like double that!! With a little luck, 51 will be his last birthday in the White House!
